snippet: The Bunnery, a cafe in Jackson Hole, Wyo., has introduced pancake mixes in double chocolate, coconut vanilla and wild blueberry.
abstract: Bunnery, a cafe in Jackson Hole, Wyo, introduces pancake mixes in double chocolate, coconut vanilla and wild blueberry; home cooks simply add eggs, milk and melted butter to produce pancakes and waffles that are flavorful and hearty.
lead_paragraph: The Bunnery, a cafe in Jackson Hole, Wyo., has introduced pancake mixes in double chocolate, coconut vanilla and wild blueberry.

headline.seo: The Bunnery Offers Pancake Mixes in New Flavors
headline.main: Pancakes for Any Meal, Maple Syrup Not Included
headline.print_headline: Pancakes for Any Meal, Maple Syrup Not Included
